Once per turn, during your Main Phase you can: shuffle all other cards you control into the Deck, also your opponent draws 1 card; Until your opponent's next End Phase, the names of all "Malevolessence" monsters in your possession become "Malevolent Nightmare" and their effects become " This card gains 200 ATK. Negate the effects of the cards sent to the GY by this effect while those cards are in the GY (even if this card leaves the field). This effect cannot be negated.
